steadystate.axi: - 2.0 * PI * r * he_lambda * (tanz * dr1 - tanr * dz1)
steadystate.cart: - 2.0 * PI * r * he_lambda * (tanz * dr1 - tanr * dz1)

transient.axi: - 2.0 * PI * r * he_lambda * (tanz * dr1 - tanr * dz1)
transient.cart: - 2.0 * PI * r * he_lambda * (tanz * dr1 - tanr * dz1)

heat_heat_flux.equation: f = - \lambda \frac{\partial T}{\partial n_0} = f_0 + \alpha \left ( T_\mathrm{ext} - T \right) + \epsilon \sigma \left ( T_\mathrm{amb}^4 - T^4 \right)
heat_heat_flux.name: Heat flux

heat_heat_flux.equation: f = - \lambda \frac{\partial T}{\partial n_0} = f_0 + \alpha \left ( T_\mathrm{ext} - T \right) + \epsilon \sigma \left ( T_\mathrm{amb}^4 - T^4 \right)
heat_heat_flux.name: Heat flux

emission_jacobian.axi: SIGMA0 * he_eps * r * 4 * uval * value1*value1*value1 * vval

emission_vector.axi: r * (- SIGMA0 * he_eps * he_Ta*he_Ta*he_Ta*he_Ta + SIGMA0 * he_eps * value1*value1*value1*value1) * vval
emission_vector.cart: (- SIGMA0 * he_eps * he_Ta*he_Ta*he_Ta*he_Ta + SIGMA0 * he_eps * value1*value1*value1*value1) * vval
emission_vector.planar: (- SIGMA0 * he_eps * he_Ta*he_Ta*he_Ta*he_Ta + SIGMA0 * he_eps * value1*value1*value1*value1) * vval

volume.equation: -\, \div \left( \lambda\,\, \grad T \right) + \rho c_\mathrm{p} \left(\frac{\partial T}{\partial t} + \vec{v} \cdot \grad T\right) = Q
volume.name: Volume

jac_laplace.axi: dhe_lambda * r * uval * (dr1 * vdr + dz1 * vdz)

velocity.cart: he_rho * he_cp * ((he_vx - y * he_va) * udx + (he_vy + x * he_va) * udy) * vval
velocity.planar: he_rho * he_cp * ((he_vx - y * he_va) * udx + (he_vy + x * he_va) * udy) * vval
